entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries changing to 60 percent chance of rain showers this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this morning. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow or rain. High plus 4.
